snippet: Misao Okawa, the world’s oldest person, said Wednesday that 117 years did not seem like such a long time. Ms. Okawa, born in Osaka on March 5, 1898, was recognized as the world’s oldest person by Guinness World Records in 2013.
abstract: Misao Okawa, Japanese woman who holds Guinness record for being world's oldest person, says her 117 years on planet do not seem particularly long.
lead_paragraph: Misao Okawa, the world’s oldest person, said Wednesday that 117 years did not seem like such a long time. Ms. Okawa, born in Osaka on March 5, 1898, was recognized as the world’s oldest person by Guinness World Records in 2013.

headline.main: Japan: Swift Fly the Years, 117 So Far
headline.print_headline: Japan: Swift Fly the Years, 117 So Far
